means: 在其上，在那上面，…之后立即

sentence.Network_en: a meeting to discuss the annual accounts and the auditors' report thereon
sentence.Network_cn: 讨论年度报表及其审计报告的会议

sentence.Network_en: The old man touched the sick man thereon he was healed.
sentence.Network_cn: 老人摸了那病人一下,他立刻就好了.

sentence.Network_en: There was a table and a huge book lay thereon.
sentence.Network_cn: 那里有一张桌子,桌子上有一本书.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 商务合同英译应注意的问题_英语网 ... 对于那个： whereto； 在其上： thereon/thereupon； 在上文： hereinabove/hereinbefore；.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... thereof 关于 thereon 在那上面 thereupon 立刻.
[推荐]外贸常用英语[旺旺英语论坛] ... thereof 及其，由此，它的 thereon 关于那 therewith 对此.
chapter1... ... debate n 辩论，讨论 thereon adv 在那上面，…之后立即 affinity n 倾向，喜好，本性；密切关系；姻亲关系；类同.

list.abs: particular conditions stipulated in the documents or superimposed thereon ;, 单据上规定的或特别附加栅的具体条件;
a person who acquires a bill of exchange by lawful means other than endorsement shall provide evidence according to law to prove his rights thereon .非经背书转让，而以其他合法方式取得汇票的，依法举证，证明其汇票权利。
a text and the commentary thereon ., 正文及其评注.
A marine policy may be assigned by endorsement thereon or in other customary manner ., 海上保险单可以用在保险单上背书或用其他习惯方式转让.

entry.def: Thereon means on the object or surface just mentioned.

example.ex: There was a card on each door with a guest's name inscribed thereon.
example.tran: 每扇门上都有张卡，上面印着客人的名字。

entry.def: Thereon can be used to refer back to a thing that has previously been mentioned to show that the word just used relates to that thing.

example.ex: You will, in addition, pay to the Bank any losses, costs, expenses or legal fees (including VAT thereon).
example.tran: 另外，你还须向银行支付所有损失、成本、花销和法律费用(包括与此相关的增值税)。
